item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-11
item.description: Googleâ€™s Message app can now handle iMessage reactions, challenges Apple with new features (4 minute read) Google rolled out several product updates today, including improvements to Google Messages, Android widgets, Google TV, Google Photos, Nearby Share, Android Auto, and Accessibility features.
